2099090.name: Alaris
2099090.description:
A global crisis that only continues to escalate. A dangerous run-in with a shadowy stranger. And a mysterious word that won't stop gnawing at you. How does everything tie together? And what role could you possibly play in all of this? 

Enter a world of magic—of Fae and Dragon.

The Enchanting Prodigy | He/They

"Hmmm... Now there's an interesting question. Maybe if you beg?"

An accomplished Drake with a colorful reputation. Many know his name, but few know his heart. Do you have what it takes to break past their flirty exterior?

The Selfless Martyr | He/Him

"Very funny.... But you shouldn't start something you can't finish."

Strong, protective, and reliable. If you asked the town to describe Druk, these are the three words you'd get.  But everyone, no matter how strong, has a weakness. What's his?

The Shunned Scholar | He/Him

"That's not—It's not for you, it's my job."

The classic librarian: grumpy. And you know what else is classic. Underneath all that grumpiness lies someone a little... less grumpy.

The Burdened Seraph | They/Them

"My arm is here for you should you need it."

The head Wyvern, and a fellow healer just like you. When you meet, there's an instant connection. And yet, for someone who's supposed to be your "partner," Etza seems awfully intent on doing everything themself...

The Shadowed Soldier | He/They

"I do dream of this... Don't you?"

This man seems intent on having you to himself. They lurk in the shadows, haunting the corners of your mind. What could be the reason behind their obsession?

The Haunted Protector | Any/All

"..."

Shrouded in mystery, they seem to want nothing to do with you. And yet, no matter how hard either of you might try to prevent it, you keep running into each other. Why?

  • A Customizable Protagonist: Choose your name, pronouns, and personality

  • Personality: Shape your personality with four different traits (Bravery, Kindness, Wisdom, Charisma) and watch how the world interacts with it.

  • Free Time: Choose from four locations and go on a date of your choosing with any of our love interests.

  • Energy Vision: Tap into one of the MC's special abilities to see the different auras of the cast.

  • Memories: Revisit free time dates and let our love interests woo you as many times as you'd like.

Content Warnings

This game contains mention of mild violence, kidnapping, stalking, and mildly suggestive language; various text and camera effects, such as bouncing and jittering text, shaking camera effects, and flashes; and loud SFX, such as thunder. Player discretion is advised.
